name: yaimageuploader
short_description: Yet Another Image Uploader is a very simple plugin for Tiny MCE that allows you to upload images using the FileBrowser callback with a minimum of fuss.  It uses PHP and GD, resizes images to some limits you set, and also creates some thumbnails.
